column1: (You can only take one of the three Witch Ascendancy passives)
column2: ( 你只能在女巫的三個昇華職業中選擇一個 )

column1: (Shock increases Damage taken by up to 50%, depending on the amount of Lightning Damage in the hit, for 2 seconds)
column2: (感電根據擊中的閃電傷害總量，增加至多50%承受傷害，持續2秒)

column1: (Recently refers to the past 4 seconds)
column2: ( 近期內意指 4 秒內 )

column1: (You can only take one of the three Templar Ascendancy passives)
column2: ( 你只能在聖堂武僧的三個昇華職業中選擇一個 )

column1: (Arcane Surge grants 10% more Spell Damage, 10% increased Cast Speed, and 0.5% of maximum Mana Regenerated per second, for 4 seconds)
column2: ( 秘能波動提供 10% 更多法術傷害、增加 10% 施放速度、和每秒回復 0.5% 最大魔力，持續 4 秒 )

column1: (Poison deals Chaos Damage over time, based on the base Physical and Chaos Damage of the Skill. Multiple instances of Poison stack)
column2: ( 中毒造成持續性混沌傷害，傷害取決於初始的物理和混沌傷害總和。中毒效果可以疊加 )

column1: (Ignoring Resistances means your Damage cannot be modified in any way by any Resistance stats)
column2: ( 無視抗性表示你的傷害不被任和抗性所影響 )

column1: (You can only take one of the three Ranger Ascendancy passives)
column2: ( 你只能在遊俠的三個昇華職業中選擇一個 )

column1: (You can only take one of the three Marauder Ascendancy passives)
column2: ( 你只能在野蠻人的三個昇華職業中選擇一個 )

column1: (Maximum Rage is 50)
column2: ( 盛怒最大層數 50 )

column1: (You lose 1 Rage every 0.5 seconds if you have not been Hit or gained Rage Recently)
column2: ( 若你近期沒有被擊中或獲得盛怒，每 0.5 秒失去 1 層盛怒 )

column1: (Allies on your Consecrated Ground Regenerate a percentage of their Maximum Life per second. Hits against Enemies on your Consecrated Ground have increased Critical Strike Chance)
column2: ( 站在奉獻地面上的友方每秒回復一定百分比的最大生命 )

column1: (Elemental Ailments are Ignited, Scorched, Chilled, Frozen, Brittle, Shocked, and Sapped)
column2: (元素異常狀態包含點燃、焦灼、冰緩、冰凍、易碎、感電和殘喘)

column1: (You can only take one of the three Shadow Ascendancy passives)
column2: ( 你只能在暗影刺客的三個昇華職業中選擇一個 )

column1: (Intimidated enemies take 10% increased Attack Damage)
column2: (被威嚇的敵人增加 10% 承受的攻擊傷害)

column1: (Adrenaline grants 100% increased Damage, 25% increased Attack, Cast and Movement Speed and 10% additional Physical Damage Reduction)
column2: ( 腎上腺素提供增加 100% 傷害，增加 25% 攻擊、施放和移動速度、和 10% 額外物理傷害減免 )

column1: (Onslaught grants 20% increased Attack, Cast, and Movement Speed)
column2: ( 猛攻增加你 20% 攻擊速度、施放速度，和移動速度 )

column1: (You can only take one of the three Duelist Ascendancy passives)
column2: ( 你只能在決鬥者的三個昇華職業中選擇一個 )

column1: (Culling Strike means enemies that are on 10% or lower life after your Hit are Killed)
column2: ( 對生命等於或少於 10% 最大生命的敵人可以造成撲殺，敵人將直接死亡 )

column1: (Choose one of the three attached options)
column2: ( 請在三個選項中擇一 )

column1: (Bleeding deals Physical Damage over time, based on the base Physical Damage of the Skill. Damage is higher while moving)
column2: ( 流血造成持續性物理傷害，傷害取決於初始的物理傷害。移動時受到的流血傷害增加 )

column1: (Blinded enemies have their Chance to Hit halved)
column2: ( 被致盲的敵人命中率減半 )

column1: (Withered applies 6% increased Chaos Damage Taken, and can be inflicted up to 15 times)
column2: (凋零增加 6% 承受混沌傷害，至多可以堆疊 15 次)

column1: (Freeze lowers Enemy Action Speed to zero, preventing them from acting. Duration is based on the Cold Damage of the Hit)
column2: (冰凍使敵人行動速度降至 0，使他們無法行動。根據擊中的冰冷傷害決定持續時間)

column1: (Enemies you Taunt can only target you, and deal 10% less damage to anyone else. Taunt lasts for 3 seconds)
column2: （被你嘲諷敵人只能以你為目標，並對其他人造成 10% 較少傷害。嘲諷持續 3 秒）

column1: Enemies have -12% to Total Physical Damage Reduction against your Hits
column2: 敵人對抗你的擊中時，總物理傷害減免 -12%

column2: 敵人對抗你的擊中時，總物理傷害減免 -5%

column1: Enemies have -10% to Total Physical Damage Reduction against your Hits
column2: 敵人對抗你的擊中時，總物理傷害減免 -10%

column1: 3% more Damage per Summoned Totem
column2: 每個召喚的圖騰都使總傷害額外提高 3%

column1: Enemies you Impale have -5% to Total Physical Damage Reduction against Impale Hits
column2: 被你穿刺的敵人對抗穿刺擊中的總物理傷害減免 -5%

column1: Enemies you Impale have -10% to Total Physical Damage Reduction against Impale Hits
column2: 被你穿刺的敵人對抗穿刺擊中的總物理傷害減免 -10%

column1: Auras from your Skills grant 3% increased Attack and Cast
column2: 你技能的光環可使你和週圍友軍的攻擊和施法

column1: You and nearby Allies have +20% to Elemental Resistances
column2: 你和週圍友軍的元素抗性 +20%

column1: Enemies have -15% to Total Physical Damage Reduction against your Hits
column2: 敵人對抗你的擊中時，總物理傷害減免 -15%

column1: 30% increased Critical Strike Chance against Shocked Enemies
column2: 對感電目標的暴擊率提高 30%

column1: (Fortify grants 20% less Damage Taken from Hits)
column2: ( 護體承受 20% 更少來自擊中的傷害 )

column1: (Defences are Armour, Evasion Rating and Energy Shield)
column2: (防禦指護甲, 閃避和能量護盾)

column1: (Ailments that deal Damage are Bleeding, Ignited, and Poisoned)
column2: (傷害類異常狀態包括流血、點燃和中毒)

column1: (Leeched Life is recovered over time. Multiple Leeches can occur simultaneously, up to a maximum rate)
column2: (吸取的生命會隨時間逐漸回復。多個吸取效果可以同時發生, 但有一個上限)

column1: (Physical Damage Reduction cannot be negative)
column2: （物理傷害減免不能為負）

column1: (Projectile Attacks gain Damage as they travel farther, dealing up to 30% more Attack Damage with Hits to targets)
column2: (投射物攻擊飛得越遠, 造成傷害越高, 最多可對目標額外造成30%的傷害)

column1: (Ignite deals Fire Damage over time, based on the base Fire Damage of the Skill, for 4 seconds)
column2: (點燃根據技能的基礎火焰傷害，造成持續火焰傷害，持續4秒)

column1: (Warstaves are considered Staves)
column2: （戰杖視為長杖）

column1: (Affects Melee Strikes, including the Default Attack. Does not apply to Areas of Effect)
column2: （影響近戰打擊，包括普通攻擊。無法用于效果區域）

column1: (Rune Daggers are considered Daggers)
column2: （符文匕首視為匕首）

column1: (The Stun Threshold determines how much Damage can Stun something)
column2: (造成暈眩所需的傷害量代表暈眩門檻)

column1: (Maximum Resistances cannot be raised above 90%)
column2: （最大抗性不能超過 90%）

column1: (Unholy Might grants 30% of Physical Damage as extra Chaos Damage)
column2: (不潔之力將附加等同30%物理傷害的混沌傷害)

column1: (They will deal the same total damage over a shorter duration)
column2: （他們會在短時間內造成相同的傷害）

column1: (Knockback pushes Enemies away when Hit)
column2: (命中時擊退敵人)

column1: (Leeched Energy Shield is recovered over time. Multiple Leeches can occur simultaneously, up to a maximum rate)
column2: （被偷取的能量護盾會持續恢復。可以同時進行多次偷取，次數有上限）

column1: (No chance to avoid damage can be higher than 75%)
column2: （躲避傷害的幾率不能高于 75%）

column1: (Leeched Mana is recovered over time. Multiple Leeches can occur simultaneously, up to a maximum rate)
column2: (吸取的魔力會隨時間逐漸回復。多個吸取效果可以同時發生, 但有一個上限)

column1: (Debuffs you are Unaffected by can still be placed on you, but will not actually apply their effect)
column2: (你受到的未生效的減益效果依然會被顯示，但是他們不會產生效果)

column1: (Chill reduces Enemy Action Speed by 10% for 2 seconds)
column2: (冰緩敵人10%並持續2秒)

column2: （離開此區域，地面的效果也會附加于你、友軍或敵人）

column1: (Enemies that are Covered in Ash have 20% less Movement Speed and 20% increased Fire Damage Taken)

column2: （光環只能給受影響的事物提供加成）

column1: (Unnerved enemies take 10% increased Spell Damage)
column2: （恐懼的敵人承受的法術傷害提高 10%）

column1: (Killing an Enemy is not Spawning a corpse)
column2: （擊敗敵人不會喚起靈樞）

column1: (Shock increases Damage taken by 15%)
column2: （感電使敵人承受的傷害提高 15%）

column1: (Chill reduces Enemy Action Speed by 10%)
column2: (冰緩敵人10%)

column1: (While you have Phasing, your movement is not blocked by Enemies)
column2: ( 當你進入迷蹤狀態時, 你將不會被敵人所阻擋 )

column1: (Hindered enemies have reduced movement speed)
column2: (被緩速的敵人移動速度會降低)

column1: (A Hit that removes at least 15% of Maximum Life is a Savage Hit)
column2: ( 一次攻擊使目標失去 15% 最大生命以上的傷害時, 該攻擊會被視為殘暴打擊 )

column1: (Blitz Charges have a base Duration of 5 seconds)
column2: （疾電球的基礎持續時間為 5 秒）。

column1: (Ailments that do not deal Damage are Scorched, Chilled, Frozen, Brittle, Shocked, and Sapped)
column2: (非傷害類異常狀態包括冰緩、冰凍、燒灼、脆弱、精疲力盡和感電)

column1: (Overkill Damage is any Damage from a Hit in excess of the Enemy's remaining Life)
column2: (溢出傷害是造成的傷害超出怪物剩餘生命的部分)

column1: (You are on Low Life if you have 35% of your Maximum Life or less)
column2: (生命低于35%時進入瀕血狀態)

column2: （【靈巧】一開始有 15% 幾率躲避法術或攻擊擊中，並使移動速度提高 30%。該增益隨時間流逝遞減，降低到 0% 時移除。在已經獲得【靈巧】的情況下，無法再次獲得【靈巧】）

column1: (Increases and Reductions to Maximum Energy Shield
column2: （對最大能量護盾的增幅與減益

column1: also apply to Spell Damage at 30% of their value)
column2: 有 30% 也套用于法術傷害）

column1: (Enemies with Malediction deal 10% reduced damage and take 10% increased damage)
column2: (帶有惡語術詛咒的敵人造成的傷害減少10%，受到的傷害增加10%)

column1: (Freeze lowers Enemy Action Speed to zero, preventing them from acting)
column2: (凍結可將敵人的動作速度減緩至零，使其無法行動）

column2: (當你被擊中時觸發的攻擊被稱為反擊)

column1: (Fanaticism grants Spells you Cast yourself 75% more Cast Speed, 75% reduced mana cost and 75% increased Area of Effect)
column2: （欣喜若狂使對自我施放的法術的總施法速度額外加快 75%，魔力消耗降低 75%，效果區域擴大 75%）

column1: (Gain Added Spell Damage equal to the Damage of your Main Hand Weapon)
column2: （獲得等于你主手武器傷害的附加法術傷害）

column1: (Tailwind increases Action Speed by 8%)
column2: （提速尾流使行動速度加快 8%）

column1: (Convergence grants 30% more Elemental Damage and lasts 4 seconds)
column2: （匯聚使總元素傷害額外提高 30%，並持續 4 秒）

column1: (Only Damage from Hits can be Recouped, over 4 seconds following the Hit)
column2: （僅能回收擊中傷害，它在擊中 4 秒內回收）

column1: (Ruptured targets take 25% more Damage from Bleeding, and Bleeding on them expires 25% more quickly, for 3 seconds. Up to 3 Ruptures can affect a target)
column2: （殘破的目標從流血中受到的總傷害額外提高 25%，身上的流血效果總消減速度額外加快 25%，持續 3 秒。一個目標最多 3 層殘破）

column1: (Each instance of Gale Force lasts 4 seconds. Maximum 10 Gale Force)
column2: （每個颶風之力都持續 4 秒。最多 10 個颶風之力）

column1: (Projectile Attack Hits deal 20% less Damage to targets at the start of their movement, dealing up to 60% more Damage to targets as the projectile travels farther)
column2: （投射物攻擊近距離目標時最多額外降低 20% 總傷害，但在攻擊遠距離目標時額外增加 60% 總傷害）

column1:
(These are consecutive)
(Each Conflux means all damage causes that Ailment)
column2:
(此為連續效果)
(特定匯流作用時，你所有擊中造成的傷害皆能造對應的異常狀態。)

column1:
(Inherent effects from having Rage are:
1% increased Attack Damage per 1 Rage
1% increased Attack Speed per 2 Rage
1% increased Movement Speed per 5 Rage)
column2:
( 固有的盛怒效果:
每 1 層盛怒增加 1% 攻擊傷害
每 2 層盛怒增加 1% 攻擊速度
每 5 層盛怒增加 1% 移動速度 )

column1: (Fortify grants 20% less Damage Taken from Hits, for 4 seconds)
column2: ( 護體承受 20% 更少來自擊中的傷害 ，持續 4 秒)

column1: (Enemies standing in Smoke Clouds are Blinded)
column2: ( 站在迷霧中的敵人被致盲 )

column1: (Allies on your Consecrated Ground Regenerate a percentage of their Maximum Life per second)
column2: ( 站在奉獻地面上的友方每秒回復他們一定百分比的最大生命 )

column1: (Arcane Surge grants 10% more Spell Damage and 30% increased Mana Regeneration rate, for 4 seconds)
column2: ( 秘能波動提供 10% 更多法術傷害和增加 30% 魔力回復，持續 4 秒 )

column1: (Crushed lowers Physical Damage Reduction by 15%)
column2: ( 壓碎降低 15% 物理傷害減免 )

column1: (Being Blinded causes 20% less Accuracy Rating and Evasion Rating, for 4 seconds)
column2: ( 被致盲有20%更少命中率和閃避值，持續4秒 )

column1: (Take 1% less Damage from Hits per Fortification. Maximum 20 Fortification. Fortification lasts 5 seconds)
column2: ( 每 1 層護體承受 1% 更少擊重傷害。最大 20 層護體。護體持續 5 秒)

column1: (Allies on your Consecrated Ground Regenerate a percentage of their Maximum Life per second, and Curses have 50% reduced effect on them)
column2: ( 站在奉獻地面上的友方每秒回復他們最大生命的百分比，且減少 50% 他們身上的詛咒效果 )
